title: Good Riddance to Rikers Island
text:
New York City is one of America’s safest cities, thanks to reforms that revolutionized policing in the 1990s. This week the City Council can do the same for its jails, starting with notorious Rikers Island.

Rikers is a complex of eight jails located on an island in the East River. Its very name has become a synonym for hell hole, a place where jailers and the jailed walk in fear of being brutalized. In 2017 Mayor Bill de Blasio vowed to close Rikers and distribute its population over newer and smaller jails that would be...
description: An opportunity to reform jails the way New York reformed policing.
